p.dialogue: "Oh, a stranger! My name's Vincent.#$b#Momma says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay."
"That was fun! I wanna be a boat captain some day!"
"If you look close, you can see little bugs jumping out of the sand.$h"
"Oooh! Nice find!#$b#Mom wouldn't let me keep him, though...$s"
"I wanna be just like my big brother when I grow up!$h#$e#Okay! Bye!"
"$d kent#I'm glad Dad's back... but he's different than I remember...$s|Dad's not around much... I miss playing with him.$s"
"*sigh*... Mom won't let me have any more gummies today.$s"
"Can you keep a secret, mister?^Can you keep a secret, miss?$u#$b#I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell her, okay?$u"
"I wanna look for bugs, but Mom gets mad when I'm all dirty.$u#$b#It's a tough choice."
"You're not as boring as most grown-ups!"
"#$c .3#Ew, it's boiled beet night again...$s#$e#Oh no... Mom's making lentil soup tonight.$s"
"Dad's coming back soon!#$b#I hope he brings me some toys.$u"
"Miss Penny makes me read a new book every week.$s#$b#At least she lets me pick them, sometimes!"
"$d kent#Dad seems weird since he came back. I wonder what happened to him?$s#$b#He doesn't play with me anymore.$s|I wonder if Dad will ever come home...$s"
"Hi Uncle @!^Hi Auntie @!#$e#Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up.$h"
